lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Hello again cashier. How are you doing?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Hello, mr police man, nice to meet you again! Doing good.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Please just call me Larry.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Alright, Larry. What would you like this time?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Actually I haven't came here to buy anything

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, no then for what?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: To chat with me?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Yes, something like that. See I was just promoted to lead investigator and I am responsible for this town security.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: That is great, congrats! Could I just check your ID before we continue?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Oh yeah, that is the correct way. Good job.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: And thank you for the nice words clerk, but that also means I need to carry the investigations myself. We are very understaffed, which complicates everything.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, yes that explains the news… Everyone in the town is worried.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Exactly, which is why I cannot let it continue anymore. The previous administration let it happen for too long. But not under me.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Understandable. And what you are doing is great, I will help in any way possible.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: But I have to ask why are you here?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Well, you see clerk, I didn't have time to look in depth in this particular case. But your shop was in the middle of a lot of data breaches in this town.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: No need to worry I am not juumping to concluions here, it is too early. Could you care to explain how is that possible, all the facts are pointing me to here.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No but that is not possible, there has to been a mistake!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I can’t still say for sure but maybe you have something to tell me?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I am all ears, I would like to hear your side of the story

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I only had one encounter with him.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: There was a shady guy that came to the Kiosk and demanded information. I didn't get a lot of from him because I immediately sent him away.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: He didn't mention anything? Or anything that you noticed?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: He had a white coat and his face was a bit hidden so it was hard to see him well. What I remember is he offered 1000 NEUROS

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: That is a sizable reward why did you turn it down?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am not mad, the money is good but the crimes I commit are way higher.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Well said Cashier, that will certainly help.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So that was it for now?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I certainly cannot conclude anything with this information but I am very close now

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I will report anything out of the ordinary I see, I promise!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I trust you on that kid. Shall see you soon, take care

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You have come here to interrogate me?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I deny to answer such questions, I am innocent. I have the right to stay silent…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You are annoying me, clerk.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am so sorry, I didn’t want to sound rude.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: This is no way to speak to a police officer. But It doesn't matter anymore, you are delaying the investigation. I cannot allow that. I will issue you a fine

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: WHAT, no please…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: 200 NEUROS, may that be a lesson for you..

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am sorry, please I will do what you want!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: As I said too late for that. Watch it next time. And don’t be stupid

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I understand, it won’t happen again.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: It better not, see you soon

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Silence won't help you kid. Are you sure that you know nothing about the illegal dealings?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am sorry but I can't think of anything. Yes, there probably has been a mistake

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: A mistake is one thing but in your case it seems to be a pattern...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Stealing data? As I said there is nothing I know…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Well, for now my hands seem to be tied, I don't have the evidence to prove or disprove your innocence.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I will be glad to help the investigation. I would like to catch the criminal as much as you…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I don’t doubt that even a single bit…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I will be going, kid. Take care and make sure to keep an eye out!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Will do sir! Take care
